module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Responda a las necesidades de sus clientes: ofrézcales una de las mejores soluciones de pago. Con más de 143 millones de cuentas activas en todo el mundo, PayPal es uno de los líderes en soluciones de pago en Internet y en dispositivos móviles. Disponible en 193 países y en 26 divisas, PayPal es también una de las formas de pago por Internet más reconocidas y fiables, según los clientes.

module.name: trustedshops
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3. Trusted Shop es el sello de confianza europeo del comercio en línea, le permite plantificar un ambiente de confianza y de seguridad ideal a los clientes. Con el sistema “evaluación cliente Trusted Shop” los clientes tienen la oportunidad de evaluar las prestaciones de su tienda en línea. Despúes, estas informaciones están compiladas y una nota media está atribuida simbolizada por estrellas directamente fijadas en la página web. Ese módulo refuerza la confianza de sus visitantes con respecto a su página web y le conducirá a encargar más fácilmente, lo que aumentará el índice de transformación de su tienda en línea. Descarga pronto Trusted Shops e aprovecha de condiciones especiales en calidad de usuario PrestaShop!
module.additional_description: Genuine reviews from real people. Online shoppers can enter some personal data to give their reviews a social proof. Customers will trust you even more. Upload orders from previous customers and receive reviews within hours. Or collect reviews automatically with every purchase of your customers.

module.name: mondialrelay
module.categoryName: Punto de entrega y Recogida en tienda
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3. Entregando más de 40 millones de paquetes al año, mediante su red de 6.000 puntos de recogida (“Points Relais” en Francia, Bélgica y Luxemburgo, “Punto Pack” en España), o vía entrega a domicilio, Mondial Relay es hoy uno de los más importantes actores del sector de las entregas a particulares. 12 de los 15 más importantes sites E-Commerce franceses han elegido los servicios de Mondial Relay debido a la calidad de su oferta y el control total de los procesos logísticos. Mondial Relay quiere compartir y desarrollar este saber hacer con todos los e-comerciantes, cualquier sea su nivel de actividad, sin imposición de volúmenes mínimos. Ahora esta oferta de servicios está disponible en Prestashop. Con el acceso a las mismas soluciones de entrega en puntos de recogida, hasta la fecha reservadas a nuestras grandes cuentas, sus clientes tendrán a partir de hoy más opciones, y podrán escoger la entrega de sus pedidos en una tienda de conveniencia beneficiándose de la red más amplia a nivel europeo, con el mejor nivel de calidad posible (franjas horarias, ubicaciones).
module.additional_description: Con este módulo, usted tendrá una gama más amplia de métodos de envío, los clientes apreciarán la oportunidad de ser entregados en las tiendas, lo que mejorará su tasa de conversión.

module.name: twenga
module.displayName: Adquisición de tráfico avanzada en la red Twenga
module.description: Integra tu feed de productos en el motor de búsqueda Twenga y en más de 1500 sitios web asociados gracias a Smart LEADS, de Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integra tu feed de productos en el motor de búsqueda Twenga y en más de 1500 sitios web asociados gracias a Smart LEADS, de Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Smart LEADS es una solución de adquisición de tráfico cualificado totalmente automatizada, que se dirige a las tiendas online de cualquier tamaño. Smart LEADS genera visibilidad y optimiza el rendimiento de las campañas publicitarias en la red Twenga en tiempo real. Esta red incluye los sitios web de búsqueda de shopping Twenga y más de 1500 asociados en todo el mundo entre comparadores de precios, guías de compra y sitios editoriales. Cómo funciona Smart LEADS:Smart LEADS analiza el rendimiento de tus productos en función de varias decenas de indicadores (conversiones, carrito medio, mejores ventas...).Establece el perfil de tus compradores gracias a 40 factores (historial de navegación, tipo de cliente, zona geográfica, hora...).Calcula la afinidad entre tus productos y los compradores.Clasifica los productos en función de criterios de rendimiento y de afinidad, y destaca aquellos que tienen más probabilidad de generar ventas. Esta lógica se aplica, en tiempo real, para cada display de un producto en la red de Twenga. ¡Incrementa tus ventas y mejora tus ingresos con una solución única! 2* CONVERSIONESDirígete a audiencias y a usuarios altamente cualificados3* CLIENTESIncrementa de manera significativa tu base de clientes y tus ventas6* INGRESOSOptimiza de forma precisa tus objetivos en costes de adquisición

module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently. This module integrates Youstice in your online store, making it easy to use by customers who want to complain about a service or a product.  Youstice plugin is only available for French Merchants
module.additional_description: From November, companies will be able to acquire the new Customer satisfaction management package, which includes the Youstice module, as well as protection against cost of unresolved disputes that customers might escalate to ODR (online dispute resolution) bodies. The package, offered jointly by Youstice in cooperation with AXA Protection Juridique and Prestashop meets the requirements of the  new French law on consumer disputes, while optimizing the budget of your customer service. For more information, check www.youstice.com/fr/lepack The package is only available for French companies.  Advantages: - Youstice`s customer service module plus coverage against legal disputes - Compliant with the new French consumer law - Free Trial-Period (45 days), without risk

PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.

module.additional_description: Cooperation between Dotpay and PrestaShop is an answer for sellers needs who minimalizing efforts want to increase their selling opportunities. The possibilities offered by PrestaShop are not limited only to basic Internet shop functions. They offer many more - versatile offer of developing an offer, sales analyses, banner systems applying and comments, RSS channels or goods comparison. A useful functionality is individual creation of graphics changing this way the e-shop looks. What is more, the program may be developed by external modules.

module.author: 202 ecommerce

module.additional_description: With the module Responsible Purchase by Reforest' Action, your customers can plant a tree in the world to compensate the CO2 emissions of their purchase. Thanks to YOU, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge ! Feel free to call us at +33 184 780 480 or drop us an email at contact@reforestaction.com

module.name: expressmailing
module.description: First Marketing and Newletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including the ability to send EMAIL, FAX and SMS mailing (2500 free emails + 30 free fax and 20 free sms)
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: First Marketing and Newletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including the ability to send EMAIL, FAX and SMS mailing (2500 free emails + 30 free fax and 20 free sms).
module.additional_description: With more than 13 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer.To a private address: such as home, office or a family member.To one of our 1250 pick-up points: post offices or post points like supermarkets (Delhaize, Spar), bookshops (Press Shop, Relay), service stations (Total, Q8) and neighbourhood stores.To one of our 150 parcel lockers: ideally situated in high footfall locations, stations and shopping centres. Simplifying your logistics   With the Shipping Manager, your customers select their delivery method when they place their order online. You just need to take care of the practical aspects.Follow-up and preparation of your parcelsCreation of shipping and return labels, both domestic and internationalManagement of parcels shipmentsTracking  of your parcels  This add-on is available for free to all customers who have a signed parcels contract with bpost.
module.additional_description: Shipping Manager is an application that helps you manage your parcel shipments and create your shipping and return labels, both domestic and international. • Easy to integrate, plug and play. • Simple integration in your online shop: during the order process your customers will not even notice they have been transferred to Shipping Manager • Immediate access to the three bpost delivery methods: o Home delivery o Delivery to a pick-up point o Delivery to a parcel locker • Management of your parcel deliveries through the Administration module (label printing, parcel tracking, parcel preparation follow-up). • Thanks to its adaptive design, the graphical user interface automatically changes to suit the customer’s viewing device (smartphone, tablet, PC). • Configuration of prices based on delivery method, immediately visible in the online shop • Access to the most popular options for your shipments (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) • Printing directly from the backend of Prestashop • Track and trace your parcels online from the backend

module.additional_description: Instalación y configuración sencilla: podrás integrar tú mismo el módulo Nimble Payments en tu tienda Prestashop, y aceptar en unos minutos transacciones con la seguridad que te ofrece BBVA. Y si tienes dudas cuentas con soporte técnico gratuito cualificado y localizado en España. Garantizado por PrestaShop: garantiza la compatibilidad con todas las versiones y actualizaciones de PrestaShop. Sistema de precios sencillo: un porcentaje sobre la venta que realices, sin importe fijo, y cuanto mayor sea tu facturación mensual, menor podrá ser tu tarifa mensual. Máxima seguridad responde a los estándares de seguridad y permite disfrutar de transacciones seguras para ti y tus clientes.

module.name: protectedshops
module.description: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy po
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy policy and many more. Automatic update.  2 months for free for PrestaShop users!
module.additional_description: Individual legal texts through questionnaires creation The survey considers the characteristics of the different countries, payment procedures, logistic providers, tracking solutions, social networks and can easily generate the legal texts for nearly every individual business model legally correct.   Automatic update when new laws or court decisions become effective The maintenance happens independently from the online traders. The module synchronizes the legal texts regularly with the servers of Protected Shops and cares for the actuality of the legal texts. The trader can decide which documents he wants to use and the frequency of the updating can be determined by the customer himself. The update is necessary when new laws or court decisions become effective, so that the online shop is always up to date. At that point, online traders are protected against legal proceedings.

module.description: LiveEngage es la forma innovadora de hablar con los visitantes de su web, ya sea que estén conectados a través de su escritorio o desde sus dispositivos móviles
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveEngage es la forma innovadora de hablar con los visitantes de su web, ya sea que estén conectados a través de su escritorio o desde sus dispositivos móviles. module.name: safeshops
module.description: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law. After filling in a questionnaire with tips, an independent law firm will lead you through the legal jungle and provide you with the necessary documents like general conditions, privacy/cookie policies. So, join the fastest growing label community of Belgium and enhance trust in your online sales.
module.additional_description: Why choose this service?   °Boost your customer relations °Enhance trust °Alleviate customer disputes   Choose the SafeShops Label and:   ° Promote confidence in your webshop ° Take advantage of personal legal support ° Receive e-commerce general conditions and standard documents in 4 languages. ° Increase your cross-border sales with the Emota Label ° Be part of a very dynamic e-community ° Take part in the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights (www.shoppingnights.be) ° Avoid fines and complaints.   Choose the SafeShops Label and avoid extra legal costs.   Webshops have to comply with manifold legislation.  European, local and sector bound legislation will vary…   This is the reason why Prestashop collaborates with SafeShops.  SafeShops  will  give you legal advise by setting-up your webshop.  You will receive general conditions and a privacy policy (D/Fr/E/G) that can be adapted to your specific case, in dialog with an independent lawyer.  SafeShops keeps you informed about the ever changing legislation.  SafeShops Label enhances your consumer confidence.  All this for € 295/year.   European Label as a bonus SafeShops is accredited in Europe, you will also obtain the European Emota Label. This is a nice bonus for those eager to do business abroad.   Knowledge exchange in an accessible and open community SafeShops represents more than a Label.  Besides the open community with the label certification, our free SafeShops Café offers you interesting presentations from partners and other webshops.  You will also enjoy discounts on trainings, seminars and conferences.      Inclusive our 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights Safeshops also organizes yearly the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights.  A campaign (radio and e-mail) where you can highlight your webshop during 7 nights and gather some extra attention.  All included in the certification cost. For more information please visit www.shoppingnight.be.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.
